item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Changing teleportation coords

[i]This is simple. All you have to do is search for this in client.java"varrock"Once you’ve searched that, you should see something like this (If you don’t, search it again until you see this)

[code] if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleX = 3489;
teleY = 3288;
addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleX = 3551;
    teleY = 9712;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = -1;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleX = 2599;
    teleY = 3420;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleX = 2757;
    teleY = 3477;
   addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {
    teleX = 2662;
    teleY = 3305;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
    teleX = 2549;
    teleY = 3113;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
    teleX = 2480;
    teleY = 5174;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
    teleX = 2761;
    teleY = 2784;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 1;
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

    teleX = 3131; 
    teleY = 9912;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Senntisten”){

    teleX = 3312; 
    teleY = 3376;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Kharyrll”){

    teleX = 3493; 
    teleY = 3485;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Lasaar"){

    teleX = 3007; 
    teleY = 3477;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Carrallangar"){

    teleX = 3161; 
    teleY = 3671;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Annakarl”){

    teleX = 3288; 
    teleY = 3886;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;
    addSkillXP((1*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }[/code]

To change the coords just change the ‘teleX’ and the ‘teleY’ coords to wherever you wan’t them to go. To find you’re coords in-game just type ::mypos.
